{{error}}
This public key won't be saved in Maskbook.
add_to_key_store_failed_title: The public key is NOT verified
add_to_key_store_success: The public key has been added to the Keystore
add_to_key_store_verifying: The public key has been found, verifying…
additional_post_box__encrypted_failed: Please paste the following text into the post box.
additional_post_box__steganography_post_: In the next step, Maskbook will save an image that contains encrypted message. Please attach this image to your post so others can decrypt it.
This post is shared with my friends. You may install Maskbook to decrypt the content from the image. ([I:b]) {{random}}
automation_pasted_into_bio_box: [Maskbook] We helped you append the public key to your bio. Please review and publish it!
automation_request_click_edit_bio_button: Please click the “Edit bio” button or the pencil on the bio box.
automation_request_paste_into_bio_box: Please copy your public key into the bio box and publish it.
automation_request_paste_into_post_box: Please copy your public key and publish it to your timeline!
backup_wallet_hint: Keep the 12 words below carefully in a safe place. You will need them to restore the private key of this wallet.
banner_preparing_setup: You need to setup your Maskbook account.
comment_box__paste_failed: Please paste it into the comment box.
dashboard_attach_profile_step1: Step 1: Copy the public key below
dashboard_attach_profile_step2: Step 2: Paste it into your profile biography
dashboard_attach_profile_step2_hint: Hand-by-hand guides will show up after you redirect to the webpage.
dashboard_attach_profile_step3_hint: Come back here and finish the procedure. Test if your setup is successful.
dashboard_backup_database_hint: Create a database backup file. Do it regularly.
dashboard_backup_persona_hint: You can backup your persona in the following options.
dashboard_backup_persona_mnemonic_hint: Keep the 12 mnemonic words above carefully in a safe place. You will need them to restore the private key of this persona.
dashboard_backup_persona_qr_hint: Keep the QR code carefully in a safe place. You will need them to restore the private key of this persona.
dashboard_backup_persona_text_hint: Keep the text above carefully in a safe place. You will need them to restore the private key of this persona.
dashboard_bio_test_failed: The profile bio should include {{bio}}. Please make sure you updated the profile bio of @{{name}} successfully.
dashboard_bio_test_succeeful: You have successfully connected your persona {{persona}} to @{{profile}} on {{domain}}.
dashboard_database_import_successful_hin: Your database has been restored. Existing data will be merged.
dashboard_delete_persona_confirm_hint: Do you want to delete the persona {{name}}? This operation cannot be reverted.
dashboard_disconnect_profile_hint: Do you want to disconnect {{profile}} on {{network}} from the persona {{persona}}? This operation cannot be reverted.
dashboard_import_database_hint: Restore from a previous database backup.
dashboard_import_persona_failed: Your import data is invalid. Please check again.
dashboard_import_persona_hint: Restore from a previous persona backup.
dashboard_init_header: Post on social networks without allowing the platforms to stalk you.
dashboard_init_step_-1: Be aware of your data when using Maskbook.
dashboard_init_step_-1_hint: Maskbook will collect some data (listed in the privacy policy) when you use it, but the developers of Maskbook have no access to them. The collected data are stored locally, except for the data which are necessary for enabling your friends to decrypt the posts you shared.
dashboard_init_step_1_hint: You may connect your social network profile to your persona in the next step.
dashboard_init_step_2: Step 2: Connect a social network profile
dashboard_init_step_2_hint: Now we support Facebook and Twitter.
dashboard_new_persona_created: A new persona "{{name}}" has been created. Connect a profile now! ([I:b])
dashboard_new_user_hint: Set up and start using Maskbook.
dashboard_password_helper_text: Set a password to improve the security level
dashboard_paste_database_backup_hint: Paste the database backup as text here…
dashboard_permission_required: We need permission to do that.
dashboard_persona_import_dialog_hint: You can import a persona backup in the following ways.
dashboard_ready_to_import_hint: Maskbook needs access to certain websites before you can import this backup.
dashboard_restore_database_hint: Choose a backup file to restore your database.
decrypted_postbox_decrypting_finding_per: Maskbook is looking for the public key of the author…
decrypted_postbox_decrypting_finding_pos: Maskbook is retrieving the post key to decrypt this post…
delete_contact_confirmation: Do you want to delete this contact? This operation cannot be reverted.
delete_wallet_hint: Are you sure? If you do not have backup, you will lose ALL YOUR MONEY of it.
feature_redpacket_not_supported: Experimental feature. Now only available in Maskbook desktop browser extension.
immersive_setup_add_bio_text: Add the text above in your bio to access advanced features. Please don't delete or change it.
immersive_setup_no_bio_got: There are some problems setting up the Maskbook! Please report this to us! You can find us in our Telegram group: https://t.me/maskbook_group or via email at info@dimension.com
immersive_setup_paste_into_bio: [Optional] Paste this key to your bio
immersive_setup_paste_into_bio_failed: Failed… Please add it to your bio manually
immersive_setup_username_confirm: Maskbook needs your username to connect your account. Make sure it is correct.
import_wallet_hint: Import a wallet with mnemonic words and password.
name: Name
options_mobile_export_subtitle: DO NOT share it with others!
payload_bad: This post seems to be corrupted. Maskbook cannot decrypt it.
payload_incomplete: This post is incomplete. You need to view the full post to decrypt it.
payload_throw_in_alpha41: Support for Alpha41 is deprecated. Tell your friends to upgrade Maskbook!
people_in_database: All people recorded in the Maskbook database.
please_include_proof_your_bio: Please include the content in the quote "{{bio}}" in your bio to use Maskbook
reload_to_switch_shadow_root_rendering_m: Reload to switch Advanced Security Mode
service_have_no_own_key_yet: You don't have a private key yet.
service_invalid_backup_file: This does not seem like a backup of Maskbook.
service_not_share_target: Maskbook does not find the post key. This post may not be intended to share with you.
service_others_key_not_found: The public key of {{name}} cannot be found!
service_publish_post_aes_key_failed: Failed to publish the AES key!
service_self_key_decryption_failed: Decryption failed. Maybe you selected a wrong identity or imported a key that was not used to encrypt this post.
service_unknown_payload: Unknown post version. You may need to update Maskbook.
settings_advance_security_desc: Render content in Shadow Root to prevent social network access it.
settings_disable_new_background_tab: Disable opening hidden tabs in the background
settings_disable_new_background_tab_desc: Deprecated behavior. Enable if you need to decrypt ancient posts (created before Jan 2020).
settings_image_based_payload_desc: Publishing post with image payload instead of text payload.
shared_choose_identity_title: Touch to switch your Maskbook account
welcome_1b_dragging: Drag your key backup into this dialog
